name: Sudo Quest
description:
CREDITS:

ALEXIS. H

MARTIN. V

REUBAN. B

Story:

During a rainy February morning, Reuban Breton, as usual, chose to start his laptop, and what was his amazement when he realized that his legendary talisman named 'sudo', granting quasi-divine rights, had been stolen by the Mephistophelic 'Marvin' virus.

In order to recover his talisman, the young user went in search of the 'sudo' talisman in the many folders on his computer, a mysterious, hostile environment full of surprises.

Concept:

The player must explore the files of a computer through several levels in the form of a runner in order to recover various items that can help him access the 'Root', protected by the evil 'Marvin'.

We weren't able to apply everything we had planned as it was our first jam and we were unfamilliar with unity and C# but it was a great experience to make this game as a team :).
